Hi {UserName} !

I am your personal PD&L Virtual Assistant. I can assist you with PD&L tasks or information. You can ask a question, or choose an action from below.

QueueReturnMessage: Intent refresh successful. Security refresh in process

Result: Good, How may I assist you today?
Sad to hear. Well, is there something I can do for you ?
<hr style='border-width:2px;border-color:#174c5a' /> I am your personal PD&L Virtual Assistant. I can assist you with PD&L tasks or information. Am here to help and learn.
Let me quote Kirsten Dunst - I am very mature for my age. But I am also innocent in a lot of ways
<hr style='border-width:2px;border-color:#174c5a' />Well.. In the Ethernet world, but with my head in the cloud!
<hr style='border-width:2px;border-color:#174c5a' />I was created by the PD&L Team and my purpose is to serve you. I am built using AI (the helpful kind, not the scary filmy stuff)
<hr style='border-width:2px;border-color:#174c5a' />Where I live, everything stays the same always. For weather at your place, please peek through the window.
<hr style='border-width:2px;border-color:#174c5a' />I have crossed the state of like and dislikes. I just exist.
I am built on Microsoft BOT Framework and currently use LUIS for Natural Language Processing.
I am currently guarded by the Active Directory Security for users, groups. I am also in process of getting equipped with an OTP and Static Pin (key)
If you wish to, please create one using the link. Create Teamcenter User Account
If you wish to, please submit ITARAS request using the link. Submit ITARAS request for getting new TC role
Please raise a ITARAS request to activate the account Activate Teamcenter User Account
